titleStmt.title: The plot discovered and counterplotted commended in a letter to a private friend, / from a true-hearted well-wisher to great Britains happinesse.
titleStmt.author: True-hearted well-wisher to Great Brittanes happinesse.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Tho. Vnderhill, and are to be sold at the Bible in Wood-street,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
